CustomField.description: ISO code of the source currency. Must be one of the valid alphabetic, three-letter currency ISO codes defined by the ISO 4217 standard, such as USD, GBP, or JPY
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ISO code of the source currency. Must be one of the valid alphabetic, three-letter currency ISO codes defined by the ISO 4217 standard, such as USD, GBP, or JPY
CustomField.label: Source Currency Code
